txt.en: The leader of the Scholar's Guild has asked you to brew their special Tincture of Relaxation, though you're not quite sure how relaxing it actually is....
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nBrew the Scholar's Guild Leader's Tincture of Relaxation.
Execute the recipe for the Scholar's Guild Leader's Tincture of Relaxation

'The leader of the crafting guild says that the best way to relax is with a cup of herbal tea. HAH. The best way to relax is of course my custom blended tincture of relaxation. I take it all the time and I am extremely relaxed always! Brew me several samples to take to our cousin guild so I can show them how wrong they are! I would do it, but my hands are shaking too much... from the coffee.'
Executed the recipe for the Scholar's Guild Leader's Tincture of Relaxation

'The leader of the crafting guild says that the best way to relax is with a cup of herbal tea. HAH. The best way to relax is of course my custom blended tincture of relaxation. I take it all the time and I am extremely relaxed always! Brew me several samples to take to our cousin guild so I can show them how wrong they are! I would do it, but my hands are shaking too much... from the coffee.'
Turn in the Scholar's Guild Leader's Tincture of Relaxation ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Ethel Applegarth
'It's not normally that colour, but I think this will do nicely.'
Talk to the Scholar's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in Scholar's Guild Leader's Tincture of Relaxation ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Scholar's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
'It's not normally that colour, but I think this will do nicely.'
